title: Strengthening nursing practical competencies: Project utilizing a remote and virtual laboratory (RVL) recommendation system

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental ICT utilization skills and basic social studies-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of a learning design-based RVL (Resource and Virtual Learning) recommendation system.
Learners can select personalized RVLs by analyzing individual ICT teaching competency profiles.
Learners can produce project outcomes based on RVL integrated with social studies themes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
